name: Biff Tannen
description: A central antagonist in the 'Back to the Future' trilogy known for being a bully and adversary to George McFly and Marty McFly.

content.title: Background
content.body: Biff Tannen was born in Hill Valley, California. He is a notorious bully, known particularly for tormenting George McFly during their school days. Biff later becomes a wealthy and corrupt businessman thanks to a time-travel incident involving 'Gray's Sports Almanac'.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Biff is aggressive, arrogant, and not the brightest. His main motivations are power and dominance, and he often uses intimidation and threats to achieve his goals.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: In the trilogy, Biff serves as the primary antagonist, obstructing the protagonists' efforts at various times. His character spans multiple timelines and alternate realities, becoming a key figure in the story's central conflicts.

content.title: Relationships
content.body:
- **George McFly**: Longtime rival and main victim of Biff's bullying.
- **Marty McFly**: Initially underestimated by Biff, Marty becomes a significant adversary.
- **Old Biff Tannen**: His future self who sets the alternate 1985 events in motion.

links.title: Biff Tannen - Back to the Future Wiki
